title: Kraken Lawyer Karma? The Perfect Power Nap? 8.27.21
itunes:title: Kraken Lawyer Karma? The Perfect Power Nap? 8.27.21
description:
In episode 978, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Find Your Beach co-host Rosebud Baker to discuss Sturgis rally updates, the January 6th commission demanding receipts, which hour long TV drama they could do without, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Warnings About the Sturgis Rally Have Come Tragically True
  2. Livid Trump Throws A Fit Over Jan. 6 Panel’s Sweeping Document Request
  3. Jan 6 Committee Aims Massive Doc Request Squarely At Trump
  4. READ: Judge Refers ‘Kraken’ Lawyers For Potential ‘Disbarment’ In Scathing Opinion Over Big Lie
  5. You can only save three of these shows.
  6. LISTEN: Godford - The Beast (official video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
